basic.description:
A general introduction to the history of the Crusades and holy war in the medieval period. Western, Muslim and Byzantine perspectives will be considered.
LEARNING HOURS    132 (36L;96P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: The Crusades

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     Level 2 or above.
Exclusion     No more than 1 course from HIST243; HIST343; HIST430.
One-Way Exclusion    May not be taken with or after HIST343; HIST430.
